data.eml:eml: A new species of Aulacogenia Stål (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae: Stenopodainae) from India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mukherjee, Paramita, Cai, Wanzhi, Saha, G. K. (2015): A new species of Aulacogenia Stål (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae: Stenopodainae) from India. Zootaxa 3904 (3): 415-420, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3904.3.7
